description: Radically simple task manager showing only ONE task at a time. No lists, no tags, no folders. Just: what's the one thing you should do right now? Brain dump inbox that auto-prioritizes to single focus.
target_user: Overwhelmed knowledge workers suffering from productivity app fatigue, seeking focus over features
core_loop: Dump all tasks into simple inbox
App surfaces ONE task based on urgency/energy
Complete task or snooze to later
